title: Nan Marshall'S Baked Chicken
instructions: x 9 x 2-inch or 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking pan.
Mix all dry ingredients in bag. Add 2 or 3 pieces of chicken and shake until coated.

title: Mom'S Special Party Cheese Balls
instructions: Cut cheese in small pieces or grate and allow to come to room temperature.
In mixing bowl, beat cheese and mayonnaise until smooth and creamy.
Add onion, Worcestershire sauce, paprika and parsley.
Continue to beat until thoroughly blended.
May garnish with olives, cherries or parsley.

title: Egg Custard Pie
instructions: Mix butter, eggs, salt and vanilla.

title: Pasta With Tomato Vodka Sauce
instructions: Heat oil in a large skillet. Add onion; saute until tender (not brown), 5 minutes.
Add tomatoes, vodka and red pepper; break up tomatoes with side of spoon.
Cook until sauce is reduced by 1/3 and thickened, 15 minutes.
Stir in cream; simmer, stirring (do not allow to boil) 5 minutes. Season with salt.

title: Chinese Barbecued Spareribs
instructions: Place ribs on baking sheet. With sharp knife, cut meat between bones. Crush garlic and blend with other ingredients. Spoon sauce on both sides and into cuts. Bake in 400° oven for 20 minutes on each side. Serves 4.

title: Corn Pudding
instructions: Place in buttered casserole. Bake at 300° for 1 hour.

title: Green Snap Beans
instructions: Put bacon drippings in a large pot; add the snap beans and about 2 cups water.
Just before they are done, add the salt and sugar.
Serve with fresh onions and cornbread. Yield:

title: Bean Bake
instructions: Add all cans of vegetables drained.
Bake in oven 30 minutes or slow cook in crock-pot until done.

title: K'S Brownies
instructions: Add flour, melted margarine, eggs and vanilla.
